name: What we leave behind (Team CUDAS)
description:
Welcome to "What we leave behind", a game made by team CUDAS for the Cambridge Game Jam 2023.

Controls:

  • WASD to move
  • Z to advance dialogue
  • Escape to skip dialogue

The story:

"This capsule is part of a series. Every five times our planet travels around the sun, we bury a new capsule beneath the earth and continue the series. The capsule contains objects from our culture and way of life. The objects in this capsule are not harmful, and contain information about how we lived."

This is the beginning of the message left behind in the Time Capsules with which Arki, Hila and Chonk (and don’t forget the team pet KonKon) have discovered. They detail plans of an ambitious project, and with this, the four friends venture off to uncover the secrets beneath the Earth.

Join them to explore dungeons, battle enemies and discover secrets about the history of humanity.

Credits to:

  • Asriel (Khai Yang)
  • Chonk Enthusiast (Amelia)
  • Exstranius (Alphonso)
  • Monami
  • Nakade (Chris Pang)
